name: [Cloak of Displacement](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Cloak_of_Displacement)
effects: [Displacement](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Displacement)At the beginning of the wearer's turn, the cloak activates, granting enemies  [Disadvantage](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Disadvantage) on [Attack rolls](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Attack_roll) that target the wearer. This effect lasts until the wearer takes damage.

name: [Derivation Cloak](https://bg3.wiki/wiki/Derivation_Cloak)
